adjectives.description: vulturine (comparative more vulturine, superlative most vulturine)

entries.meaning: Pertaining to or having characteristics of vultures.
examples: Somewhat below the middle height, he was lean of body and vulturine of face.
A species of crow in vast numbers is generally found to attend the larger kind of birds of prey. It is uncommonly bold and ravenous, and all its habits are vulturine  […]
